DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine long-term efficacy continuous IPu liatermin infusion administer concomitant standard anti-Parkinsonian therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Extended Treatment With Liatermin ( r-metHuGDNF ) Administered Continuous Intraputaminal ( IPu ) Infusion Subjects With Idiopathic Parkinson 's Disease Who Have Completed Previous Trial Liatermin
